title: Paper Street Soap Co. Script font (Tyler Durdens businesscard)
content:
[http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/ff/ff688e6032d1d4472f87df5e1d0500...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081031081630/http:/wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/ff/ff688e6032d1d4472f87df5e1d050073.5056.jpeg "http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/ff/ff688e6032d1d4472f87df5e1d050073.5056.jpeg")  
Anyone know this?

 [‹ Condensed San Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081031081630/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46707 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need this for a logo redraw... cheers ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081031081630/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46704 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cuidado

comments.content: You might want to check out Letterhead Fonts, there’s a lot of fonts that capture that era of advertising and packaging.
